name: Nice League of Legends Wikia
description:
Companion style
Makes wikia/fandom bar at top dark.
Displays all tabbed stats.
Hides the video at the top of the page.
Expands tabbed content (e.g. Corki W, Shaco Pets)

user.name: LymiaH
user.about:
I made styles for personal use.
Now I'm sharing them with you :)

additional_info:
2019 January 24rd - Fixed skill widths.
2019 January 23rd - Added new wikia/fandom domain and made skill scaling groups clearer.
2018 January 6th - Fixed bug with line height by removing unnecessary line height changes
2018 January 4th - Expand tabbed skills (e.g. Corki W)
2018 January 2nd - Remove champion spotlight video
2017 November 5th - Initial Release
